title: American Airlines cancellations, Bitcoin mining bans, and Friend of Pivot Chuck Todd
summary:
Kara and Scott talk about American Airlines cancelling flights because of staff shortages. They also discuss China banning the mining of Bitcoin in the country. Meanwhile, the SEC is readying new climate change disclosure regulations. Then we are joined by NBC News Political Director, Moderator and Host of Meet the Press and Host of Peacockâ€™s Meet the Press Reports, Chuck Todd to talk about the future of news streaming.
